title: Looking for a 5's team
body: I am looking for a ranked 5 man team, I don't mind what rank, just for fun.

replies.body:
Well if your gold/plat player you should join our team 

http://boards.oce.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/team-recruitment/MIAPlElt-looking-for-goldplat-players-from-season-4-and-willing-to-start-a-semi-serious-ranked-team
